game.name: Super Meat Boy
game.desc: Get ready for a wild ride with Super Meat Boy! This tough as nails platform game is the brainchild of the dynamic duo, Edmund McMillen and Tommy Refenes, also known as 'Team Meat'. Born from the success of their 2008 Flash game, 'Meat Boy', this game promises thrills, spills, and maybe a few broken controllers. Are you up for the challenge?
